name: Roster Dilemma
overview:
Rosterdilemma.com is a fantasy football research tool for Fantasy Football Team Owners to use in order to determine which player to start or sit each week.

Rosterdilemma.com was created to provide a quick research and analysis tool for people with “roster dilemmas” or roster decisions of which player to start or sit. Rosterdilemma.com provides a forum for Fantasy Football Team Owners to post their Roster Dilemmas to other fellow Fantasy Football Owners all over the world. By posting questions/polls or Roster Dilemma’s you can then e-mail them to your friends & family and display them over the web for your friends and others to vote on in order to help you make the most educated decision of who to start or sit each week during the Fantasy Football Season and to increase your fantasy success.
